name: Ausclimate
0:
”Alexa, turn on the air purifier”
”Alexa, turn off the heater”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Use Alexa to control your Ausclimate products. After connecting Alexa to your products in a few simple steps:
1. Download our "Ausclimate" app in app market, then register an account (or log in directly if you already have an account);
2. Configure our devices in "Ausclimate" app and change appropriate name for your devices;
3. Enable "Ausclimate" skill on Alexa app, you'll be navigated to the login page, follow the instructions on the page to complete linking;
4. Tell Echo "Alexa, discover my devices". Wait for Echo to say "Search complete";
5. Now all setup is finished. You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these:
 "Alexa, turn on [device name]."
 "Alexa, turn off [device name]." 
 "Alexa, what is the target temperature of the [device name]?"
 "Alexa, set [device name] to twenty."
 "Alexa, set [device name] to N."
 "Alexa, what is the temperature of [device name]."
 "Alexa, set [device name] to [mode value]."
 "Alexa, turn on child lock on the [device name]."
 "Alexa, turn off child lock on the [device name]."
 "Alexa, is child lock on for the [device name]?"
